title: NotATether
author: NotATether
created_time: January 06, 2023, 11:13:35 AMLast edit: January 06, 2023, 12:42:31 PM by NotATether
content: As the title says, I need to exchange $200 I have in BTC to USDT (ERC20) because a certain service will only take stablecoins for payment. And pronto.You send first, unless you already have green DT trust. I'm not wasting more time with scammers.

comments.author: skarais
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on January 06, 2023, 11:13:35 AMAs the title says, I need to exchange $200 I have in BTC to USDT (ERC20) because a certain service will only take stablecoins for payment. And pronto.You send first, unless you already have green DT trust. I'm not wasting more time with scammers.After discussion via PM, I have agreed to send @NotATether $200 USDT.I also asked the OP to send me $200 in btc immediately to the address I sent via PM.Glad to have helped.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: $200 in BTC sent, I consider this deal done. Locking this thread.
